task.title: Adding a computed column to a cell

taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a matrix displayed in your editor.

step.cmd: From the Editor, right-click the cells area and select Insert Computed Column.
step.stepresult: The computed column is added to the cell.

step.cmd: On the General tab, change the default Aggregation Type assigned by the system if needed.
On the Computation tab, set the Computation, and the parameters.
step.info: See section for more details on the computations and their parameters.
